description:
As rehearsals begin and Kikuchi polishes her script, she reveals her philosophy to a concerned Tomozaki. Mimimi and Tomozaki work on their comedy.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Even Fairies Feel Lonely When They`re Away from Their Spring by Themselves
Yousei mo Izumi no Hoka de Hitoribocchi Da to Sabishii
妖精も泉の外で一人ぼっちだと寂しい
